Title: The Matrix
Writer: Naomi Ekperigin (staff writer), Ilana Glazer (created by), Ilana Glazer, Abbi Jacobson (created by), Abbi Jacobson, Anthony King (staff writer), Jen Statsky (staff writer)
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, Janeane Garofalo, Hannibal Buress
Plot: Feeling sucked into a never-ending web of technology, Abbi and Ilana unplug for a day in the park that's filled with rollerblading, canine nuptials and an emergency medical situation.
